    • Method Detail

      • getAttributeStringValue

        public static java.lang.String getAttributeStringValue(android.content.Context context,
                                                       android.util.AttributeSet attrs,
                                                       int[] stylable,
                                                       int stylable_attr)
        Gets the attribute string value by passing it to Resources.Theme.obtainStyledAttributes(), which will take care of parsing the attributes.
        Parameters:
        context - The Context this is associated with, through which it can access the current theme, resources, SharedPreferences, etc.
        attrs - The attributes of the XML tag that is inflating the preference.
        stylable - R.styleable.SeekBarPreference
        stylable_attr - e.g.: R.styleable.SeekBarPreference_seekBarTitle
        Returns:
        attr string value
